name: pure-save

0.1.0.name: pure-save
0.1.0.description: A save function that can bypasses all save hooks like format on save functions. Works with atom-ide-ui too. Useful for saving a file without auto-format when needed.

readme:
# atom-pure-save
A save function that can bypasses all save hooks like format on save functions.

Works with atom-ide-ui too.

Useful for saving a file without auto-format when needed.
